programme.title: Highlander: The Animated Series
programme.desc: An attack on the Dundees leaves Quentin and his sister orphaned. Ramirez arrives to begin Macleod's training.

programme.title: Highlander: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Ramirez takes Quentin to see Stevenson, a Jettator specializing in hydroelectic power.

programme.title: Highlander: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Ramirez is teaching Quentin about balance in a fashion that should seem very familiar to fans of the original film. Nearby, the Dundees are terrorized by a gang sporting a machine gun.

programme.title: Highlander: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Ramirez takes Quentin to find Erol, but they are captured by his mortal former assistant, Melvyn.

programme.title: Highlander: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A flashback shows the death of Connor MacLeod at Kortan's hand during the Jettator ceremony.

programme.title: Kong: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Jason and Tann journey to the mysterious Kong Island with their college professor, Dr. De La Porta.

programme.title: Kong: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Professor De La Porta kidnaps Dr. Jenkins and forces her to reveal the location of the powerful Primal Stones.

programme.title: Kong: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The theft of the Primal Stones upsets the island's environmental balance, triggering earthquakes, storms and volcanoes.

programme.title: Kong: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Lua is captured and brainwashed into releasing the ancient demon Chiros, it's up to Jason and Kong to defend the island from the evil monster.

programme.title: Kong: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Jason, Tann, Lua and Kong travel to New York to find out who is stealing ancient tablets connected to the Primal Stones.

programme.title: Love Shriners
programme.desc: Dynamic Media Partners - Shriners 2 - 1/7 PP SHFAFR8CGTH Shriners - 3/12 Updated to SHFTM8CGTH

programme.title: Roswell Conspiracies: Aliens, Myths and Legends
programme.desc: Ruck, the werewolves pack leader, escapes from the Alliance and tracks down the EMP bomb which the Yeti race has been hiding. The doomsday device is accidentally activated while it’s being stolen, and Logan must discover its location before time runs out.

programme.title: Roswell Conspiracies: Aliens, Myths and Legends
programme.desc: An alien satellite that has been “watching” us for fifty years collides with a NASA shuttle. Rinaker doesn’t want its secrets exposed, so he sends Logan, Blaze, Trueblood and Ti-Yet on a stolen Lycanthrope ship to retrieve the data before anyone else. Logan hopes the information might reveal information about his father.

programme.title: Roswell Conspiracies: Aliens, Myths and Legends
programme.desc: Cattle mutilation draws Logan to a small town and saddles him with a new partner, Dr. Petrovic. They discover science has spawned more trouble – hybrid, mutant, alien fire ants. Now they must rescue the townsfolk and the Detail Team before Rinaker calls an air strike on the town.

programme.title: Roswell Conspiracies: Aliens, Myths and Legends
programme.desc: Mab, Queen of the Banshees, dispatches two bullheaded Minotauri bounty hunters and a cerberus parahound after the same prize – the head of Sh’lainn Blaze.

programme.title: Roswell Conspiracies: Aliens, Myths and Legends
programme.desc: A vampire that once worked for INTRAcom has mutated and is now staging attacks on his former boss’s holdings in an effort to protect the Brazilian rain forest. The creature rescues Logan, but Rinaker calls for an air strike on a lost Vampire city rather than risk its discovery by INTRAcom.

programme.title: Dork Hunters From Outer Space
programme.desc: Five teenage friends fight against an evil alien species named the Dorks in order to retrieve some peculiar and extremely dangerous explosives called the microgalaxies.

programme.title: Dork Hunters From Outer Space
programme.desc: Five teenage friends fight against an evil alien species named the Dorks in order to retrieve some peculiar and extremely dangerous explosives called the microgalaxies.

programme.title: Dork Hunters From Outer Space
programme.desc: Five teenage friends fight against an evil alien species named the Dorks in order to retrieve some peculiar and extremely dangerous explosives called the microgalaxies.

programme.desc: Five teenage friends fight against an evil alien species named the Dorks in order to retrieve some peculiar and extremely dangerous explosives called the microgalaxies.

programme.title: Kong: Return to the Jungle
programme.desc: Hunters transport a great ape from his island habitat to a zoo in New York.
